meanings.sent1: I spread a butterball on my toast.
meanings.sent2: The chef shaped the butter into a perfect butterball.
meanings.sent3: The butterball rolled off the plate and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as round and smooth as a butterball.
meanings.sent5: The butterball melted slowly in the warm pan.

meanings.sent1: She affectionately called her grandpa a butterball.
meanings.sent2: The baby looked like a little butterball in his chubby cheeks.
meanings.sent3: He waddled around the room like a happy butterball.
meanings.sent4: She hugged her friend tightly, feeling like she was hugging a soft butterball.
meanings.sent5: The butterball of a man laughed heartily at the joke.

meanings.sent1: For Thanksgiving, we bought a delicious butterball turkey.
meanings.sent2: The butterball turkey was juicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The butterball turkey strutted proudly around the farm.
meanings.sent4: The butterball turkey stood out among the other birds with its plumpness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasting butterball turkey filled the house.
